subject: feat(charts): add full-width activity timeline below Projects
body:
Embed repo-tor's activity-timeline stacked bar chart (60-day commit
history by repo) between Projects and Skills. Uses full-width layout
(max-w-7xl) since the 60-day timeline benefits from extra horizontal
space. Colors series built from theme tokens: primary, secondary,
accent, plus complementary tones.

Restructured <main> into two constrained sections (max-w-4xl) with
the timeline sitting between them at wider width.

Tags: charts, embed, layout
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 2
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: neutral
Epic: cv-layout
Semver: minor
